title: 06/08/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 06/08/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin explains why the Nets are perfectly made to be successful in today’s offensive friendly NBA. He argues in favor of Aaron Rodgers skipping OTAs and minicamp after winning the MVP last season. He also ranks his top 10 players in the NBA playoffs and tells you why this 2-time MVP was left off the list. Plus, former Packers WR James Jones joins the show tell Colin how the Green Bay front office can repair their relationship with Rodgers.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
